import React from 'react' import './Match.css' import GenericFlag from '../images/icons8-flag-96.png' function Match({ countries, match, id }) { const handleClick = () => { if(match.stage === "group"){ fetch(`/api/local-group-win/${match.group}/${match.matchid}/${match.local}/`, { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" }, body: JSON.stringify({ group: match.group, matchid: match.matchid, local: match.local }) }) .then(res => console.log(res)) } } return (
{countries[match.local-1] ? : }

{countries[match.local-1] ? countries[match.local-1].name : "Qualified " + match.local}

{ match.matchid < 49 &&
}

{countries[match.visitor-1] ? countries[match.visitor-1].name : "Qualified " + match.visitor}

{countries[match.visitor-1] ? : }

{new Date(match.date).getDate()}/{new Date(match.date).getMonth()}: {match.stadium} Stadium at {new Date(match.date).getUTCHours()}:00hs

) } export default Match
